events.message: I have just filed a claim regarding the recent car accident I was involved in last night on Main Street.
Your claim related to the vehicle collision has been categorized under Auto Accident for further processing.
An agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim, and they will contact you shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the collision and will keep you updated on next steps.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
All requested documents, including police report and repair quotes, have been uploaded to your claim file.
Our team has started the investigation into the accident to verify the details and assess liability.
The investigation into your vehicle collision claim has been completed with all necessary verifications done.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on the damage estimates and policy coverage terms.
Thank you for providing feedback on the proposed settlement; we are glad it meets your expectations.
Your claim for the car accident has been officially approved, and we are processing your payment next.
The settlement payment for your vehicle damage has been issued to your bank account successfully.
Your auto accident claim has now been closed, thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
The record of your claim has been archived in our system for any future reference or audits.
